content: last treble_crochet turn 85 88 treble_crochet divide for arms all sizes ch2 1tr in next 9 11 11 treble_crochet 1tr ch1 ch1 ch3 in next treble_crochet skip 14 17 18 treble_crochet 1tr in next 21 24 25 treble_crochet 1tr ch1 ch1 ch3 in next treble_crochet skip 14 17 18 treble_crochet 1tr in next 11 13 13 treble_crochet turn 44 51 52 treble_crochet and 2 ch1 ch1 ch3 all sizes row1 ch2 1tr in each treble_crochet and chain to end turn 46 53 56 treble_crochet row2 ch2 1tr in each treble_crochet till end turn 46 53 56 treble_crochet repeat last row 3 4 7 times 11 13 16 row in total first and second size fasten_off and rejoin bottom right third size don t fasten_off bottom band row1 ch1 1dc in same st as ch1 1dc in each treble_crochet along bottom till end turn row2 ch1 1dc in same st as ch1 1dc in each double_crochet to end turn row3 ch1 1dc in same st as ch1 1dc in each double_crochet to end don t fasten_off continue to button band button band working up front of work row1 ch1 1dc in same st as ch1 1dc spaced evenly up front of work around neck and down front turn mark out for 3 buttons row2 ch1 1dc in same st as ch1 1dc in each st to first marker ch2 skip 1dc 1dc in each st to next marker ch2 skip 1dc 1dc in each st to next marker ch2 skip 1dc 1dc in each st to end turn row3 ch1 1dc in same st as ch1 1dc in each double_crochet and 1dc in ch2 space to end fasten_off arms both alike rejoin yarn in middle ch1 of underarm row1 ch2 1tr spaced evenly around arm to end slip_stitch to top of ch2 turn 21 24 26 treble_crochet row2 ch2 1tr in each treble_crochet to end slip_stitch to top of ch2 turn 21 24 26 treble_crochet row 3-5 6 7 repeat row 2 first size don t turn at end of row 5 continue to cuff second size turn at end of row 6 continue to cuff third size don t turn at end of row 7 continue to cuff cuff all sizes row1 ch1 1dc in same st as ch1 decrease 1dc in next 6 8 9 double_crochet decrease 1dc in next 7 8 9 double_crochet decrease 1dc in last double_crochet slip_stitch to first double_crochet don t turn 18 21 23 st row2 ch1 1dc in same st as ch1 1dc in each st around slip_stitch to first double_crochet don t turn 18 21 23 double_crochet row 3 repeat row 2 fasten_off weave in ends add 3 buttons thank you for downloading this pattern please do not sell this pattern or claim it to be your own design you may make and sell the finished item or donate finished item to charity i hope you enjoy making this item thanks michelle x
